backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence metadata describing added gallery images and related frontend file changes.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all main frontend components and utilities in the project.
frontend/index.css: Root Tailwind and CSS variable definitions for light/dark themes and global styling.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point loading the SPA root and main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component composing all site sections, background, audio toggle, and surprise button.
frontend/src/components/AudioPlayerToggl: Audio control button that initializes, plays, and mutes background music.
frontend/src/components/background/Roman: Canvas‑based falling petal animation with layered background images and gradients.
frontend/src/components/CountdownTimer.t: Displays time remaining until Valentine’s Day using values from a custom countdown hook.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer showing a love dedication with animated heart icons.
frontend/src/components/gallery/FramedGa: Image component with heart‑frame overlay, fade‑in, and hover zoom effects.
frontend/src/components/sections/Countdo: Section revealing a countdown card with scroll‑triggered fade‑in animation.
frontend/src/components/sections/Gallery: Gallery section rendering six generated images plus two user‑uploaded photos in animated frames.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Hero section with intersection-based fade-in animation showing hearts, a title, and subtitle.
frontend/src/components/sections/LoveMes: Section that reveals a styled love letter card when scrolled into view.
frontend/src/components/sections/Reasons: Animated accordion listing multiple reasons for love, revealed on scroll.
frontend/src/components/SurpriseButton.t: Button that opens the romantic surprise modal when clicked.
frontend/src/components/SurpriseModal.ts: Modal dialog showing a special Valentine message with animated hearts.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and managing a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for managing Internet Identity login state, identity loading, and authentication actions.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file exporting nothing because no backend queries are needed.
frontend/src/hooks/useValentinesCountdow: Hook computing a live countdown to the next Valentine’s Day, updating every second.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base plus custom romantic color palette, themes, and component utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and rendering the app.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, animations, fonts, and plugins for a themed, animated UI.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s state, features, and design goals for a romantic Valentine’s Day single‑page website.
